channel.title: hugo on Evert Timberg
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Evert Timberg

item.title: About this Site
item.description: Welcome to my personal site. I wrote the site using Hugo, a static site generator written in Go. It’s been a great introduction to the Go template language. Hosting is done via static files published to Github pages. The theme for this site is based on a modified version of the Introduction theme.
